lyrics.lyric: So Far Away
lyrics.tlyric: 遥不可及
lyrics.singer: Martin Garrix / David Guetta / Jamie Scott / Romy Dya

lyrics.lyric: Light 'em up, light 'em up
lyrics.tlyric: 点燃一束光，照亮它们

lyrics.lyric: Tell me where you are, tell me where you are
lyrics.tlyric: 告诉我你身在何处 身在何处

lyrics.lyric: The summer nights, the bright lights
lyrics.tlyric: 仲夏夜晚 烛光摇曳

lyrics.lyric: And the shooting stars, they break my heart
lyrics.tlyric: 流星划过夜空 也伤透了我的心

lyrics.lyric: I'm calling you now, but you're not picking up
lyrics.tlyric: 现在我拨通你的电话 但你不会再接

lyrics.lyric: Your shadow‘s so close if you are still in love
lyrics.tlyric: 你的身影近在咫尺 却远在天涯

lyrics.lyric: Then light a match, light a match
lyrics.tlyric: 划亮一根火柴 照亮黑夜

lyrics.lyric: Baby, in the dark, show me where you are
lyrics.tlyric: 宝贝告诉我 黑夜之中你在哪里

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: How I miss you every single day
lyrics.tlyric: 我每日每夜无时无刻不想念着你

lyrics.lyric: When I see you on those streets
lyrics.tlyric: 走在街上看到每个人都觉得是你的身影

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: Tell me there's a river I can swim that will bring you back to me
lyrics.tlyric: 告诉我我还有计可施 还有机会让你回心转意

lyrics.lyric: Cause I don't know how to love someone else
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我真的不知道如何再去爱上别人

lyrics.lyric: I don't know how to forget your face
lyrics.tlyric: 我不知道该如何忘掉你的容颜

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: God, I miss you every single day and now you're so far away
lyrics.tlyric: 我对你朝思暮想 如今你遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: So far away
lyrics.tlyric: 如此遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: It's breaking me, I'm losing you
lyrics.tlyric: 失去你我也痛彻心扉

lyrics.lyric: We were far from perfect
lyrics.tlyric: 我们虽不是完美恋人

lyrics.lyric: But we were worth it
lyrics.tlyric: 但这一切的经历都值得

lyrics.lyric: Too many fights, and we cried
lyrics.tlyric: 我们争吵过 也哭红过双眼

lyrics.lyric: But never said we're sorry
lyrics.tlyric: 但我们都从未说过抱歉

lyrics.lyric: Stop saying you love me
lyrics.tlyric: 别告诉我你对我还存有爱意

lyrics.lyric: You're calling me now, but I can't pick up
lyrics.tlyric: 你试图联系我 但我不能有任何回应

lyrics.lyric: Your shadow's too close, and I'm still in love
lyrics.tlyric: 你的身影还是如此清晰 我也依然爱着你

lyrics.lyric: The summer's over now
lyrics.tlyric: 夏天已经结束

lyrics.lyric: But somehow it still breaks my heart
lyrics.tlyric: 不知怎么仍然刺痛我的心

lyrics.lyric: We could have had the stars, oh
lyrics.tlyric: 我们本可以拥有灿烂星河

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: How I miss you every single day
lyrics.tlyric: 我每日每夜无时无刻不想念着你

lyrics.lyric: When I see you on those streets
lyrics.tlyric: 走在街上看到每个人都觉得是你的身影

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: Tell me there's a river I can swim that will bring you back to me
lyrics.tlyric: 告诉我我还有计可施 还有机会让你回心转意

lyrics.lyric: Cause I don't know how to love someone else
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我真的不知道如何再去爱上别人

lyrics.lyric: I don't know how to forget your face
lyrics.tlyric: 我不知道该如何忘掉你的容颜

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: God, I miss you every single day and now you're so far away
lyrics.tlyric: 我对你朝思暮想 如今你遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: So far away
lyrics.tlyric: 如此遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: So far away, oh
lyrics.tlyric: 如此遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: So far away
lyrics.tlyric: 如此遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: So far away
lyrics.tlyric: 如此遥不可及

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: How I miss you every single day
lyrics.tlyric: 我每日每夜无时无刻不想念着你

lyrics.lyric: When I see you on those streets
lyrics.tlyric: 走在街上看到每个人都觉得是你的身影

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: Tell me there's a river I can swim that will bring you back to me
lyrics.tlyric: 告诉我我还有计可施 还有机会让你回心转意

lyrics.lyric: Cause I don't know how to love someone else
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我真的不知道如何再去爱上别人

lyrics.lyric: I don't know how to forget your face
lyrics.tlyric: 我不知道该如何忘掉你的容颜

lyrics.lyric: Oh, love
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 挚爱

lyrics.lyric: God, I miss you every single day when you're so far away
lyrics.tlyric: 我对你朝思暮想 如今你遥不可及
